attributes.action: make the Magna Carta the basis for Iraq's government and print enough copies for all government ministers there.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Melvyn Bragg considers the Magna Carta the one of the greatest documents ever.   The day before the Magna Carta we had a tyrrany; the day after, the world's greatest democracy.  What's good enough for Melvyn and Britain is surely good enough for Iraq.

The Carta may need to be translated beforehand.

Photocopies should be double-sided.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
